title: Scott Adams as Inconsistent yet More Determined Naturalist
description:
Scott Adams is as close to a naturalist public skeptic as we have on the scene today but can he stay consistent with what he believes people to be? Does he fit in CS Lewis' scheme? 

Interview with Moleneux https://youtu.be/sILr5-qb6Rw 
Adams Periscope https://youtu.be/yWIKClRGKrA
